overview: On the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the medical humanitarian non-governmental organization “Doctors of the World Greece” Nikos Megrelis directs a documentary based on the organization’s rare visual material and the stories of its members who participated in dozens of missions in Greece and around the world – in any place where people were in need of urgent medical treatment, when stricken by natural disasters, poverty, wars and famines, and regardless of their color, religion, gender and sexual orientation.
title: Wherever People Are
